TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Mouse extends System.Object
public ref class Mouse abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示特定執行緒的滑鼠裝置。

span.span: Represents the mouse device to a specific thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供滑鼠相關事件，方法與屬性，其提供有關滑鼠狀態的資訊。The class provides mouse related events, methods and, properties which provide information regarding the state of the mouse. 每個事件，定義為附加的事件也會重新公開在基底類別所和做為新的路由事件。Each event that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 通常，它是處理滑鼠事件的應用程式在更方便並，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle mouse events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 靜態成員主要類別委派的呼叫執行緒的輸入管理員。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread's input manager.

summary.span: 將滑鼠輸入捕捉至指定的項目。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，不論資料指標位於其框線都會收到滑鼠輸入。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果未指定，預設值是。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要放開滑鼠捕捉時，呼叫傳遞`null`為要擷取的項目。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果將滑鼠擷取時或是就會引發事件和滑鼠，底下的項目將不會輸入和先引發。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 這可讓捕捉的項目釋放擷取，才能有機會和事件會路由傳送。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool Capture(class System.Windows.IInputElement element) cil managed
Public Shared Function Capture (element As IInputElement) As Boolean

span.span: The element to capture the mouse.

summary.span: 將滑鼠輸入捕捉至指定的項目。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element.

returns.span: 如果項目可以捕捉滑鼠，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，不論資料指標位於其框線都會收到滑鼠輸入。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果未指定，預設值是。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要放開滑鼠捕捉時，呼叫傳遞`null`為要擷取的項目。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果將滑鼠擷取時或是就會引發事件和滑鼠，底下的項目將不會輸入和先引發。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 這可讓捕捉的項目釋放擷取，才能有機會和事件會路由傳送。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以擷取特定項目的滑鼠方法。The following example shows how to capture the mouse to a specific element by using the method. [!code-csharp[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)] [!code-vb[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)]

The capture policy to use.

summary.span: 使用指定的 將滑鼠輸入捕捉至指定項目。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified .

returns.span: 如果項目可以捕捉滑鼠，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠資料指標的框線內是否會收到滑鼠輸入。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders. 若要放開滑鼠捕捉時，呼叫傳遞`null`為要擷取的項目。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果將滑鼠擷取時或是就會引發事件和滑鼠，底下的項目將不會輸入和先引發。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 這可讓捕捉的項目釋放擷取，才能有機會和事件會路由傳送。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以擷取特定項目的滑鼠方法。The following example shows how to capture the mouse to a specific element by using the method. [!code-csharp[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)] [!code-vb[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Captured As IInputElement
public: static property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ Captured { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得已捕捉滑鼠的項目。

span.span: Gets the element that has captured the mouse.
The element captured by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，不論資料指標位於其框線都會收到滑鼠輸入。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業時，擷取以這種方式，並且保持擷取，直到拖放作業的拖放動作發生為止。The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得具有滑鼠捕捉的項目。The follow example shows how to obtain the element that has mouse capture. [!code-csharp[mousecapturesample#MouseCaptureMouseCaptured](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousecapturemousecaptured)] [!code-vb[mousecapturesample#MouseCaptureMouseCaptured](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousecapturemousecaptured)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DirectlyOver As IInputElement
public: static property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ DirectlyOver { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠指標位於其正上方的項目。

span.span: Gets the element the mouse pointer is directly over.

value.span: 滑鼠指標位於其上方的項目。

span.span: The element the mouse pointer is over.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以包含多個項目。Controls can be composed of multiple elements. 報告在滑鼠指標位於複合控制項並不是控制項本身的特定項目。 reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself. 比方說，根據哪一個部分指標是，透過可能會報告屬性的屬性或。For example, depending on which part of a the pointer is over, the property could report the of the property or the . 使用上的屬性和判斷滑鼠是否在項目，包括其視覺子系的項目上方，或控制複合項目。Use the property on and to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements. 如果項目具有滑鼠擷取，滑鼠指標會視為直接在元素上方無論是將滑鼠指標。If an element has mouse capture, the mouse pointer is considered directly over the element regardless of the where the mouse pointer is.

param.span: 要在其中計算滑鼠位置的座標空間。

span.span: The coordinate space in which to calculate the position of the mouse.

summary.span: 取得相對於指定項目的滑鼠位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.

returns.span: 相對於參數 的滑鼠位置。

span.span: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠指標位置會計算相對於原點，0，0 點的項目左上角的指定項目。The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified element with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0. 在拖放作業時，滑鼠位置無法可靠地判斷透過。During drag-and-drop operations, the position of the mouse cannot be reliably determined through . 這是因為滑鼠 （可能包括擷取） 控制會保留原始的拖曳項目，直到完成拖放，更受基礎行為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]呼叫。This is because control of the mouse (possibly including capture) is held by the originating element of the drag until the drop is completed, with much of the behavior controlled by underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] calls. 請改嘗試下列方法：Try the following approaches instead: - 呼叫方法傳遞至拖曳事件 (， ， )。Call the method of the that is passed to the drag events (, , ). - 呼叫[GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp)，使用 P/Invoke。Call [GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp), using P/Invoke. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來判斷滑鼠指標的位置。The following example shows how to use to determine the position of the mouse pointer. 滑鼠指標位置會儲存在結構。The position of the mouse pointer is stored in a structure. 並的值物件會顯示在。The and values of the object are displayed in a . [!code-csharp[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsPositionMouse](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouserelatedsnippetspositionmouse)] [!code-vb[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsPositionMouse](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouserelatedsnippetspositionmouse)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent GotMouseCaptureEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly GotMouseCaptureEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 附加事件。

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由的事件，並將結果儲存為可註冊路由的事件的類別上的欄位時，會建立路由的事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 這些識別碼會包含識別的名稱、 擁有者類型、 處理常式的類型、 路由策略和公用程式方法新增擁有者的事件。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您經常使用這些識別碼做為參數，事件系統的方法，來識別特定的路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

The state of the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷是否檢查是否按下滑鼠左鍵的狀態等於列舉值。The following example shows how to determine whether the left mouse button is pressed by checking if the state of the is equal to the enumeration value . 如果按下按鈕時，哪些更新顯示在此範例中的項目呼叫的方法。If the button is pressed, a method is called which updates display elements in the sample. [!code-csharp[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsGetLeftButtonMouse](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouserelatedsnippetsgetleftbuttonmouse)] [!code-vb[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsGetLeftButtonMouse](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouserelatedsnippetsgetleftbuttonmouse)]

Public Shared ReadOnly LostMouseCaptureEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 附加事件。

The state of the middle mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷是否檢查是否按下滑鼠中間鍵的狀態等於列舉值。The following example shows how to determine whether the middle mouse button is pressed by checking if the state of the is equal to the enumeration value . 如果按下按鈕時，哪些更新顯示在此範例中的項目呼叫的方法。If the button is pressed, a method is called which updates display elements in the sample. summary.span: 表示旋轉滑鼠滾輪以捲動一行的單位數。

span.span: Represents the number of units the mouse wheel is rotated to scroll one line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在目前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，這個欄位的值為 120。In the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], the value of this field is 120. 公開欄位的目的是要讓廠商能夠建置更精細地解析滑鼠滾輪在未來，可能會包含格沒有旋轉的滾輪。The intention of the field exposure is to allow for vendors to build finer-resolution mouse wheels in the future, that perhaps would include a freely rotating wheel without notches. 預期是這類裝置會在每個訊息中傳送更多的訊息，每次旋轉，但使用較小的值。The expectation is that such a device would send more messages per rotation, but with a smaller value in each message. 若要支援這種可能性，您應該新增連入的差異值，直到數量為止 （以便進行差異輪替，您會收到相同的回應），或捲動以回應更頻繁的訊息部分的行。To support this possibility, you should either add the incoming delta values until the amount is reached (so for a delta-rotation you get the same response), or scroll partial lines in response to the more frequent messages. 您也可以選擇您自己的捲軸資料粒度，並累積您自己選擇的差異，直到該差異為止，或可能參考的滑鼠敏感度的使用者可控制系統參數並進行推斷這些滑鼠滾輪差異閾值為止。You could also choose your own scroll granularity and accumulate deltas of your own choosing until that delta is reached, or perhaps reference user-controllable system parameters for mouse sensitivity and extrapolate these to mouse wheel delta thresholds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由的事件，並將結果儲存為可註冊路由的事件的類別上的欄位時，會建立路由的事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 這些識別碼會包含識別的名稱、 擁有者類型、 處理常式的類型、 路由策略和公用程式方法新增擁有者的事件。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您經常使用這些識別碼做為參數，事件系統的方法，來識別特定的路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.Cursor OverrideCursor { get; set; }
Public Shared Property OverrideCursor As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ OverrideCursor { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ value); };
member this.OverrideCursor : System.Windows.Input.Cursor with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定整個應用程式的游標。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.

value.span: 覆寫游標，如果未設定 ，則為 。

span.span: The override cursor or if the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，是設定為將會套用至整個應用程式。The that is set to will be applied to the whole application. 若要清除覆寫，將至`null`。To clear the override , set to `null`. 設定至會強制滑鼠游標不會顯示，但仍會處理滑鼠事件。Setting to will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式，可用來切換游標變更之間的單一項目和整個應用程式的範圍。The following example shows an event handler for a that is used to toggle the scope of a cursor change between a single element and the entire application. 如果控制項引發事件`rbScopeElement` ，設定旗標，表示資料指標變更的範圍並設為`null`。If the control that raised the event is the `rbScopeElement`, a flag that denotes the scope of the cursor change is set and is set to `null`. 引發事件的控制項是否`rbScopeApplication` ，設定旗標，表示資料指標變更的範圍並設定為屬性控制項，名為`DisplayArea`。If the control that raised the event is the `rbScopeApplication`, a flag that denotes the scope of the cursor change is set and is set to the property of the control named `DisplayArea`. [!code-csharp[cursors#CursorsSampleOverrideCursor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/cursors/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#cursorssampleoverridecursor)] [!code-vb[cursors#CursorsSampleOverrideCursor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/cursors/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#cursorssampleoverridecursor)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property RightButton As MouseButtonState
public: static property System::Windows::Input::MouseButtonState RightButton { System::Windows::Input::MouseButtonState get(); };

summary.span: 取得右鍵的狀態。

span.span: Gets the state of the right button.
The state of the right mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷是否檢查是否按下滑鼠右按鈕的狀態等於列舉值。The following example shows how to determine whether the right mouse button is pressed by checking if the state of the is equal to the enumeration value . 如果按下按鈕時，哪些更新顯示在此範例中的項目呼叫的方法。If the button is pressed, a method is called which updates display elements in the sample. [!code-csharp[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsGetRightButtonMouse](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouserelatedsnippetsgetrightbuttonmouse)] [!code-vb[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsGetRightButtonMouse](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouserelatedsnippetsgetrightbuttonmouse)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool SetCursor(class System.Windows.Input.Cursor cursor) cil managed

param.name: cursor
param.span: 要將滑鼠指標設定至這個游標。

span.span: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.

summary.span: 將滑鼠指標設定至指定的 。

span.span: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified .

returns.span: 如果已設定游標，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the cursor was set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在設定資料指標不會套用至任何特定的項目，但而不是適用於整個應用程式。The cursor being set does not apply to any particular element, but rather it applies to the whole application. 因此之後設定滑鼠指標移動設定資料指標在物件上的資料指標，游標會變更一次。So, if after setting the cursor the mouse pointer moves over an object which sets the cursor, the cursor will be changed again. 若要強制滑鼠指標在特定以及強制這所有的項目上設定屬性。To force the mouse pointer to a specific and to force this on all elements, set the property. 若要將游標放在特定的項目上，使用上的屬性或。To set the cursor on a specific element, use the property on either or . 如需有關基底元素的詳細資訊，請參閱[基底的項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see the [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).
